verses.verse: Peter, <WG4074> an apostle<WG652> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> to the strangers<WG3927> scattered throughout<WG1290> Pontus,<WG4195> Galatia,<WG1053> Cappadocia,<WG2587> Asia,<WG773> and<WG2532> Bithynia,<WG978>

Elect <WG1588> according<WG2596> to the foreknowledge<WG4268> of God<WG2316> the Father,<WG3962> through<WG1722> sanctification<WG38> of the Spirit,<WG4151> unto<WG1519> obedience<WG5218> and<WG2532> sprinkling<WG4473> of the blood<WG129> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ:<WG5547> Grace<WG5485> unto you,<WG5213> and<WG2532> peace,<WG1515> be multiplied.<WG4129>

Blessed <WG2128> be the<WG3588> God<WG2316> and<WG2532> Father<WG3962> of our<WG2257> Lord<WG2962> Jesus<WG2424> Christ,<WG5547> which according<WG2596> to his<WG848> abundant<WG4183> mercy<WG1656> hath begotten us again<WG313> <WG2248> unto<WG1519> a lively<WG2198> hope<WG1680> by<WG1223> the resurrection<WG386> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ<WG5547> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498>
To <WG1519> an inheritance<WG2817> incorruptible,<WG862> and<WG2532> undefiled,<WG283> and<WG2532> that fadeth not away,<WG263> reserved<WG5083> in<WG1722> heaven<WG3772> for<WG1519> you,<WG2248>

Who are kept<WG5432> by<WG1722> the power<WG1411> of God<WG2316> through<WG1223> faith<WG4102> unto<WG1519> salvation<WG4991> ready<WG2092> to be revealed<WG601> in<WG1722> the last<WG2078> time.<WG2540>

Wherein <WG1722> <WG3739> ye greatly rejoice,<WG21> though now<WG737> for a season,<WG3641> if<WG1487> need be,<WG1163> <WG2076> ye are in heaviness<WG3076> through<WG1722> manifold<WG4164> temptations: <WG3986>

That <WG2443> the<WG3588> trial<WG1383> of your<WG5216> faith,<WG4102> being much<WG4183> more precious<WG5093> than of gold<WG5553> that perisheth,<WG622> though<WG1161> it be tried<WG1381> with<WG1223> fire,<WG4442> might be found<WG2147> unto<WG1519> praise<WG1868> and<WG2532> honor<WG5092> and<WG2532> glory<WG1391> at<WG1722> the appearing<WG602> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ: <WG5547>

Whom <WG3739> having not<WG3756> seen,<WG1492> ye love;<WG25> in<WG1519> whom,<WG3739> though now<WG737> ye see<WG3708> him not,<WG3361> yet<WG1161> believing,<WG4100> ye rejoice<WG21> with joy<WG5479> unspeakable<WG412> and<WG2532> full of glory: <WG1392>
Receiving <WG2865> the<WG3588> end<WG5056> of your<WG5216> faith,<WG4102> even the salvation<WG4991> of your souls.<WG5590>

Of <WG4012> which<WG3739> salvation<WG4991> the prophets<WG4396> have inquired<WG1567> and<WG2532> searched diligently,<WG1830> who prophesied<WG4395> of<WG4012> the<WG3588> grace<WG5485> that should come unto<WG1519> you: <WG5209>

Searching <WG2045> what,<WG5101> or<WG2228> what manner<WG4169> of time<WG2540> the<WG3588> Spirit<WG4151> of Christ<WG5547> which was in<WG1722> them<WG846> did signify,<WG1213> when it testified beforehand<WG4303> the<WG3588> sufferings<WG3804> of<WG1519> Christ,<WG5547> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> glory<WG1391> that should follow.<WG3326> <WG5023>

Unto whom<WG3739> it was revealed,<WG601> that<WG3754> not<WG3756> unto themselves,<WG1438> but<WG1161> unto us<WG2254> they did minister<WG1247> the things,<WG846> which<WG3739> are now<WG3568> reported<WG312> unto you<WG5213> by<WG1223> them that have preached the gospel<WG2097> unto you<WG5209> with<WG1722> the Holy<WG40> Ghost<WG4151> sent down<WG649> from<WG575> heaven;<WG3772> which things<WG3739> the angels<WG32> desire<WG1937> to look<WG3879> into.<WG1519>

Wherefore <WG1352> gird up<WG328> the<WG3588> loins<WG3751> of your<WG5216> mind,<WG1271> be sober,<WG3525> and hope<WG1679> to the end<WG5049> for<WG1909> the<WG3588> grace<WG5485> that is to be brought<WG5342> unto you<WG5213> at<WG1722> the revelation<WG602> of Jesus<WG2424> Christ;<WG5547>
As <WG5613> obedient<WG5218> children,<WG5043> not<WG3361> fashioning yourselves<WG4964> according to the<WG3588> former<WG4386> lusts<WG1939> in<WG1722> your<WG5216> ignorance: <WG52>
But <WG235> as<WG2596> he which hath called<WG2564> you<WG5209> is holy,<WG40> so<WG2532> be<WG1096> ye<WG846> holy<WG40> in<WG1722> all manner<WG3956> of conversation;<WG391>
Because <WG1360> it is written,<WG1125> Be<WG1096> ye holy;<WG40> for<WG3754> I<WG1473> am<WG1510> holy.<WG40>

And <WG2532> if<WG1487> ye call on<WG1941> the Father,<WG3962> who without respect of persons judgeth<WG2919> <WG678> according<WG2596> to every man's<WG1538> work,<WG2041> pass<WG390> the<WG3588> time<WG5550> of your<WG5216> sojourning<WG3940> here in<WG1722> fear: <WG5401>

Forasmuch as ye know<WG1492> that<WG3754> ye were not<WG3756> redeemed<WG3084> with corruptible things,<WG5349> as silver<WG694> and<WG2228> gold,<WG5553> from<WG1537> your<WG5216> vain<WG3152> conversation<WG391> received by tradition from your fathers;<WG3970>
But <WG235> with the precious<WG5093> blood<WG129> of Christ,<WG5547> as<WG5613> of a lamb<WG286> without blemish<WG299> and<WG2532> without spot: <WG784>

Who verily<WG3303> was foreordained<WG4267> before<WG4253> the foundation<WG2602> of the world,<WG2889> but<WG1161> was manifest<WG5319> in<WG1909> these last<WG2078> times<WG5550> for<WG1223> you,<WG5209>

Who by<WG1223> him<WG846> do believe<WG4100> in<WG1519> God,<WG2316> that raised him up<WG1453> <WG846> from<WG1537> the dead,<WG3498> and<WG2532> gave<WG1325> him<WG846> glory;<WG1391> that<WG5620> your<WG5216> faith<WG4102> and<WG2532> hope<WG1680> might be<WG1511> in<WG1519> God.<WG2316>

Seeing ye have purified<WG48> your<WG5216> souls<WG5590> in<WG1722> obeying<WG5218> the<WG3588> truth<WG225> through<WG1223> the Spirit<WG4151> unto<WG1519> unfeigned<WG505> love of the brethren,<WG5360> see that ye love<WG25> one another<WG240> with<WG1537> a pure<WG2513> heart<WG2588> fervently: <WG1619>

Being born again,<WG313> not<WG3756> of<WG1537> corruptible<WG5349> seed,<WG4701> but<WG235> of incorruptible,<WG862> by<WG1223> the word<WG3056> of God,<WG2316> which liveth<WG2198> and<WG2532> abideth<WG3306> forever.<WG1519> <WG165>

For <WG1360> all<WG3956> flesh<WG4561> is as<WG5613> grass,<WG5528> and<WG2532> all<WG3956> the glory<WG1391> of man<WG444> as<WG5613> the flower<WG438> of grass.<WG5528> The<WG3588> grass<WG5528> withereth,<WG3583> and<WG2532> the<WG3588> flower<WG438> thereof<WG846> falleth away: <WG1601>

But <WG1161> the<WG3588> word<WG4487> of the Lord<WG2962> endureth<WG3306> forever.<WG1519> <WG165> And<WG1161> this<WG5124> is<WG2076> the<WG3588> word<WG4487> which by the gospel is preached<WG2097> unto<WG1519> you.<WG5209>
